author: kpedro88
body:
I ran the clang-tidy check `cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init` on the entire pythia8 code base. This creates initializer lists in constructors for all POD types to avoid uninitialized member variables. A version of this patch has been submitted to pythia8 upstream and will hopefully be included in the next public release (whatever comes after 8.235).

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/22214
(among other things)
title: Fix all uninitialized member variables
